mainText:
I'm not going to lie. I'm a PC user and have never really been a fan of
Macs. But I can't deny what a revolutionary Steve Jobs was. The man changed
what is expected of our computers, tablets, cell phones, music players, etc.
Just about everything that we have today is based off of the model that
Steve Jobs presented us. But more important than all these technological
models he presented the world, he gave us a model of how we should be as
humans. His charitable works, his desire to strive to be the best he could
be, and his persistance to never forget who he was at heart despite all his
succes is an inspiration to everyone.

RIP Steve Jobs... you will be missed.
author: Avi
